title: Essential supply
fullText:
An electrical supply system thatâ€”
(a)	has additional onsite supply that automatically engaged upon failure of the normal supply; and
(b)	is not subjected to load shedding.
NOTES:
1	Changeover between the normal supply and an alternative generator supply may take a finite time, which is usually less than 30 s.
2	AS/NZS 3009 uses the term 'emergency supply' rather than 'essential supply'.
